title: LearnPath
description: A dynamic web app that generates and tracks personalized roadmaps based on user skills and proficiency levels. Enhances learning by providing a clear and structured growth path. Designed to help users achieve their goals efficiently

title: Maternal Health Risk Predictor
description: A machine learning-based web app that predicts maternal health risks based on user input. Provides accurate health risk assessments with a user-friendly interface. Designed to support early intervention and improve maternal outcomes.

title: DataHorizon Website
description: A micro-service architecture-based website developed for DataHorizon, a digital marketing company. Integrated multiple services for seamless operation and efficient management. Ensured secure data handling with optimized performance.

title: Telangana Growth Analysis
description: A comprehensive analysis of Telangana's past growth trends presented via an interactive dashboard. Provides visual insights into key metrics for better policy decisions. Incorporates predictive models to forecast future trends.
